comments.body: It should be easy to add a test to binCompatTest for the original breakage right?
I don't think so. I don't know of a way to make it show up without referring to `AllInstancesBinCompat6`, which was introduced after 1.6.1, which `binCompatTest` uses.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +98,102 @@  @deprecated("Use cats.kernel.instances.sortedSet.catsKernelStdHashForSortedSet", "2.0.0-RC3")
  override def catsKernelStdHashForSortedSet[A: Order: Hash]: Hash[SortedSet[A]] =
    cats.kernel.instances.sortedSet.catsKernelStdHashForSortedSet[A](Hash[A])
}
